name: Puzzle Golf
description:
How to play:

  • Click on tiles to rotate them
  • When the course is correct, press the checkmark on top right
  • Click and drag on the ball to set the force
  • Release to shoot and score
Disclaimer

Puzzle Golf is currently on early development stage. Suggestions are welcome :)

Have fun, and please share the game with your friends if you had a good time!
